00029 #ifndef NONCACHEDTETRAHEDRALMESH_HPP_
00030 #define NONCACHEDTETRAHEDRALMESH_HPP_
00031 
00032 #include "ChasteSerialization.hpp"
00033 #include <boost/serialization/base_object.hpp>
00034 
00035 #include "TetrahedralMesh.hpp"
00036 
00045 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00046 class NonCachedTetrahedralMesh : public TetrahedralMesh< ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>
00047 {
00048 private:
00050     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00057     template<class Archive>
00058     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00059     {
00060        archive & boost::serialization::base_object<TetrahedralMesh<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM> >(*this);
00061     }
00062 public:
00063 
00065     void RefreshJacobianCachedData();
00066 
00074     void GetJacobianForElement(unsigned elementIndex, c_matrix<double, SPACE_DIM, SPACE_DIM>& rJacobian, double& rJacobianDeterminant) const;
00075 
00084     void GetInverseJacobianForElement(unsigned elementIndex, c_matrix<double, SPACE_DIM, ELEMENT_DIM>& rJacobian, double& rJacobianDeterminant, c_matrix<double, ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>& rInverseJacobian) const;
00085 
00093     void GetWeightedDirectionForElement(unsigned elementIndex, c_vector<double, SPACE_DIM>& rWeightedDirection, double& rJacobianDeterminant) const;
00094 
00102     void GetWeightedDirectionForBoundaryElement(unsigned elementIndex, c_vector<double, SPACE_DIM>& rWeightedDirection, double& rJacobianDeterminant) const;
00103 
00104 };
00105 
00106 EXPORT_TEMPLATE_CLASS2(NonCachedTetrahedralMesh, 1, 1)
00107 EXPORT_TEMPLATE_CLASS2(NonCachedTetrahedralMesh, 2, 2)
00108 EXPORT_TEMPLATE_CLASS2(NonCachedTetrahedralMesh, 3, 3)
00109 
00110 #endif /*NONCACHEDTETRAHEDRALMESH_HPP_*/
